nodes.text: Genial was a human male who served the First Order as a colonel. As an officer of the Reform Office, he was sent to Corellia to accompany a group of prisoners that were being handed over to Winshur Bratt. After Yama Dex, one of Bratt's employees, caught Monti Calay stealing a confidential datapad from Bratt's office, she reported it to Genial, who assumed Bratt was complicit in the crime. Bratt, not wanting to be punished as a traitor, killed Genial by throwing him over a railing into the ocean.
